## Fmt.assemble() method

Final chord of `fmt`<!-- -->. Assembles passed template string into a printf-style array of arguments that you can pass to printing function then.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
assemble(): [string, ...unknown[]];
```
<b>Returns:</b>

\[string, ...unknown\[\]\]

## Example


```ts
console.log(fmt`Hey, ${fmt.sub('Aubrey', '%o')}!`.assemble())
// ['Hey, %o!', 'Aubrey']

// spread to let `console.log` format your `fmt`!
console.log(...fmt`Hey, ${fmt.sub('Aubrey', '%o')}!`.assemble())
// Hey, 'Aubrey'!
```
